welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cabries, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Castellet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Castellet Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
